name: 8 Million Stories
lyrics:
[ti:8 Million Stories]
[ar:A Tribe Called Quest]
[al:Midnight Marauders]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]8 Million Stories - A Tribe Called Quest
[00:01.28]Went to Carvel to get a (奶昔)
[00:01.28]Milk shake
[00:02.77]This honey ripped me off for all my loot cakes (这个女孩骗了我所有的钱)
[00:05.27]The car  oh yeah  there's money in my jacket (哦对了，我车上的夹克里还有钱)
[00:07.41]Somebody broke into my ride and cold macked it (可是有人打破了我的车窗，我心好凉)
[00:10.36]Yo tip I tell you man the devil's tryin' it (我只能说这可能是魔鬼对我的考验吧)
[00:12.67]But I'm goin' to stay strong 'cause I ain't buyin' it (我还是很坚强，我不买了)
[00:15.19]Tonight I'm taking Sherry out  I don't have jack to wear (今晚我会拿出雪莉酒，我没有杰克丹尼威士忌)
[00:17.73]You know I gots to look dipped in the fresh new gear (你知道我会试试这个新酒)
[00:20.48]Cool I found something  so I ironed it (酷，我想到了，我还要去熨衣服)
[00:22.92]I then got caught up on the phone  oh sh*t I'm fryin' it (然后我又接了电话，哦，真该死，我的衣服烫坏了)
[00:25.42]Will someone tell me what did I do to deserve this  (谁能告诉我，我该怎么做才能躲过这些厄运？)
[00:27.87]I think I'll  pull out my suit for Sunday service (我想周末我该去教堂祈祷了)
[00:30.43]My little brother wants Barney  cool I'm gettin' it (我弟弟想要玩具，好吧，我这就去买)
[00:33.10]Took him down to Kay-Bee  they ain't sellin' it (带他去了Kay Bee，可是这里没有他想要的)
[00:35.62]Here we go with the cryin'  yo he's throwin' fits (然后他就哭了，呦，他暴跳如雷)
[00:38.27]My blood pressure's blowin' up  I can't take the sh*t (我真的快要气炸了，我受不了了)
[00:40.82]Finally got what he wanted now he's good to go (最后我买了他想要的玩具，现在他终于高兴地回家了)
[00:43.32]Again the ride was smashed  where's my radio  (可是我的车又被偷了，我的收音机去哪儿了？)
[00:45.33]
[00:45.87]One time the car was in the shop I had to borrow see (我不得不去租车行租辆车)
[00:48.44]They had no mercy on the car they almost killed me (他们对我的车一点也不仁慈，他们快要把我逼疯了)
[00:50.92]Where the hell can Nicki be  I'm gonna smack her up (该死的Nicki去了哪儿，我好想打她)
[00:53.48]I got the tickets for the Knicks and she cold stood me up (我买了尼克斯比赛的票，可是她放了我鸽子)
[00:55.98]I need to hit a honey off  Jarobi pass the phone (我真想揍这个女的，Jarobi给我递过来电话)
[00:57.06]
[00:58.61]Pulled out my book of hoes  oh yo Sheila's home (找找别的女孩，哦，对了，Sheila在家)
[01:00.54]
[01:01.19]Steady smilin' like a mother yo I'm read' to bone (她总是面带母性般的笑容，呦，我很了解她)
[01:03.61]Went down to hon  she's in the red zone (我去接她，可是她来例假了)
[01:06.27]Stressed out more than anyone could ever be (我比任何人都有压力)
[01:08.78]Forever tryin' to clear the samples for my new LP (我会一直努力，让收到我专辑样本的音乐人认同我)
[01:11.45]Everybody knows I go to Georgia often (所有人都知道我经常去乔治亚)
[01:13.84]Got on the flight and I ended up in Boston (坐上飞机，结果飞到了波士顿)
[01:16.40]With all these trials and tribulations yo I've been affected (我受够了我经历过的这些糟糕的事情)
[01:19.10]And to top it off  Starks got ejected (最糟糕的事情就是斯塔克斯被禁赛了)
[01:20.61]
[01:21.91]Problems  problems  problems (麻烦太多)
[01:25.75](Woe is me I'm havin') (麻烦都朝我走来)
[01:27.07]Problems  problems  problems (麻烦太多)
[01:30.98]
[01:32.35]Just last week my girl was stressin' me (上周，我女朋友对我施压)
[01:34.84]Now her best friend be undressin' me (现在我和她最好的朋友搞在了一起)
[01:36.61]
[01:37.36]Well I was lovin' her by the moon ray (好吧，晚上我很喜欢她)
[01:39.72]Now I'm tricking on her like Kinte'  c'mon (现在我却像Kinte一样欺骗她，来吧)
[01:42.52]Bought a bag of izm from the smoke shop (我买了一小袋毒品)
[01:44.89]Walkin' towards the car  here come the damn cops (该死的警察开着车朝我走来)
[01:47.41]Now I'm station bound for the Thai Sticks (现在我在车站，要去买一点烈性大麻)
[01:49.98]I bought it for my man  I don't believe this sh*t (我是帮我兄弟买的，我不相信这该死的东西)
[01:52.60]Coach sat me down from the ball team (球队的教练让我当替补队员)
[01:55.04]'Cause I was breakin' niggaz on the inseams (因为我在场内伤了黑人)
[01:57.58]Some niggaz cross town was tryin' to stick me (有些来自城里的黑人想要防守)
[01:59.97]All I had was shorts  a dollar fifty (我个子不高，可是我很男人)
[02:02.66]Picked up this girl in the hooptie (我开车去接这个女孩)
[02:05.04]Just because I rhyme she tried to soup me (就因为我写歌，她想让我为她买所有的东西)
[02:07.27]
[02:07.77]Pay for this  pay for that  loot for nails and hair (买这买那，去做指甲，去做头发)
[02:10.24]Who the hell you think I am  Mr  Belvedere  (该死的你以为我是谁，钱多得像Mr Belvedere一样吗？)
[02:12.85]Go and get a bloody job  then can we look cute (去和她缠绵，我们看上去都很可爱)
[02:15.29]Even if you give me boots  you'll neva see my loot (如果你给我买酒，我会和你缠绵)
[02:17.79]She wasn't even all of that just another hooker (我对她不感兴趣了，换个坏女人吧)
[02:19.47]
[02:20.37]So I turned that a** away  quick like Chucky Booker (于是我把她甩了，快得就像Chucky Booker)
[02:22.91]Sometimes you got put the hoes in their friggin' place (如果你遇到了只喜欢钱的女人)
[02:25.42]Just move from in front me with your botty face (赶紧让她在我面前消失吧)
[02:28.25]Problems  problems  problems (麻烦太多)
[02:31.56]
[02:32.44](Lord knows I'm havin') (上帝知道我遇到的麻烦)
[02:33.45]Problems  problems  problems (麻烦太多)
[02:36.76]
[02:37.76](Jesus Christ I'm havin') (上帝，我的麻烦太多了)
[02:38.45]Problems  problems  problems (麻烦太多)
[02:42.26]
[02:42.82](Pray for me I'm havin') (祝福我吧)
[02:43.64]Problems  problems  problems (麻烦太多)
[02:47.25]
[02:48.72]Yeah  yeah  just lay down your burdens by the riverside (耶耶，只需卸下你的压力)
[02:54.92]Hah  and you'll be alright  you know what I'm sayin'  (啊，你会好起来的，你知道我在说什么吗？)
[02:57.99]
[02:59.36]Love and peace from Phife for '93  you know what I'm sayin'  (Phife的爱与和平这张专辑93年就发行了，你知道我在说什么吗？)
[03:02.76]Tribe Called Quest  Shaheed and Tip  this is how we flip (我的团队里的人是Tribe Called Quest，Shaheed和Tip)
[03:08.73]
[03:09.60]My man Muhammad in the house  huh (我兄弟Muhammad在房间，嗯)
[03:12.05]Zulu Nation in the house  huh (祖鲁国的人也在房间里，嗯)
[03:14.57]SubRoc is in the house  huh (SubRoc在房间里，嗯)
[03:17.10]My man Skeff is in the house  huh (我兄弟Skeff在房间，嗯)
[03:19.61]Jarobi White is in the house  huh (Jarobi White在房间，嗯)
[03:22.18]Bob Power in the house  huh (Bob Power在房间，嗯)
[03:24.64]My man Eric in the house  huh (我兄弟Eric在房间，嗯)
[03:26.50]
[03:27.33]My man Nitro in the house  huh (我兄弟Nitro在房间，嗯)
[03:29.55]
[03:31.88]Help me out y'all  help me out now (你们都帮帮我吧，现在就帮帮我吧)
[03:34.39]Help me out God  I really need ya (帮帮我吧，上帝，我真的需要你的帮助)
[03:36.89]Help me out now  I really need ya (现在帮帮我吧，我真的需要你的帮助)
[03:39.39]Help me out y'all  help me out now (你们都帮帮我吧，现在就帮帮我吧)
[03:42.01]I'm havin' problems  help me out now
[03:44.54]Really need ya  to help me out now
[03:47.13]Help me out y'all  help me out now (你们都帮帮我吧，现在就帮帮我吧)
[03:49.63]Help me out y'all  help me out now (你们都帮帮我吧，现在就帮帮我吧)
[03:52.18]Help me out y'all  help me out now (你们都帮帮我吧，现在就帮帮我吧)
[03:54.76]Help me out God  I really need ya (帮帮我吧，上帝，我真的需要你的帮助)
[03:57.29]Havin' problems  help me out now (我遇到了麻烦，现在帮帮我吧)
[03:59.84]Help me (帮帮我吧)
[04:00.48]Help me (帮帮我吧)
[04:01.10]Help me (帮帮我吧)
[04:01.73]Help me Help me Help me Help me Help me (帮帮我吧)
[04:05.53]Help me Help me Help me (帮帮我吧)
